alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Knott; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 12:57PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Perry, southwestern Knott and southwestern Breathitt Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wolf Coal, or 10 miles south of Jackson, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Barwick around 100 PM EDT. Watts, Lamont, Chavies, Clayhole and Krypton around 105 PM EDT. Ned and Hardshell around 110 PM EDT. Dice around 115 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hazard, Rowdy, Ary, Bulan, Talcum, Fisty, Bearville, Emmalena, Ritchie, Carrie, Cordia and Elic. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
